mapper.select: select R.program_no as programNo, R.class_registration_no as classNo, R.user_no as userNo, R.class_payment_status as paymentStatus, R.payment_completed_date as completedDate, U.user_name as userName, U.user_tel as userTel from fitness_programs P, class_registration_histories R, users U where P.program_no = R.program_no and R.user_no = U.user_no and U.user_deleted = 'N' and R.program_no = #{value}

select H.membership_no as membershipNo, H.membership_start_date as startDate, H.membership_end_date as endDate, H.membership_period as period, H.payment_completed_date as completedDate, U.user_no as userNo, U.user_name as name, U.user_tel as tel from membership_histories H, users U where H.user_no = U.user_no order by H.membership_no desc
